bug.author: aschernov
bug.summary: CVAT new UI: bug in "hide" function
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>My actions before raising this issue</denchmark-h>
Read/searched the docs Searched past issues
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected Behaviour</denchmark-h>
The function "hide" should hide/unhide shapes <denchmark-h:h3>Current Behaviour</denchmark-h>
The "hide" function doesn't work. If you click on the corresponding icon or short key the annotated shape won't disappear. But if you grip a shape and move it somewhere it will hide. But you can't unhide it. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45849884/79754512-5a930c80-8320-11ea-85db-7df07e7f9171.gif></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Possible Solution</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h3>Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)</denchmark-h>
Draw a new shape Press "hide" (H), try to move the shape Try to unhide it
<denchmark-h:h3>Context</denchmark-h>
This function is necessary for lots of annotations scenarios

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TOsmanov>@TOsmanov</denchmark-link> , please confirm that the problem was resolved.
